patch 8.2.0358: insufficient testing for indent.c

Solution:   Add indent tests. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5736)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ba2920fe976b37326933afa820616523b509495f|patch 8.2.0359: popup_atcursor() may hang>
patch 8.2.0359: popup_atcursor() may hang

Problem:    popup_atcursor() may hang. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto)
Solution:   Take the decoration into account. (closes #5728)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0359: popup_atcursor() may hang · vim/vim@ba2920f

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8eab73132838e977092d7b46f70b4ecf6274fd6a|patch 8.2.0360: yaml files are only recognized by the file extension>
patch 8.2.0360: yaml files are only recognized by the file extension

Problem:    Yaml files are only recognized by the file extension.
Solution:   Check for a line starting with "%YAML". (Jason Franklin)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0360: yaml files are only recognized by the file extension · vim/vim@8eab731
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0360: yaml files are only recognized by the file extension · vim/vim@8eab731
attachments.text: Problem: Yaml files are only recognized by the file extension. Solution: Check for a line starting with "%YAML". (Jason Franklin)
